name: Mio Cid
description:
The theme

Since we are from Spain we decided to go with one of our most famous poems, El Cantar de mio Cid.

Rodrigo Díaz de Vivar (El Cid) is a knight who was betrayed by his own country and vanished from his kingdom. In order to return and gain the king's pardon, he must venture Al-Andalus in search of gold and riches to bring to his former country.

More info

Controls

LMB - Attack

RMB - Move

Q - Block/Parry

If you block at the right moment you'll do a parry and the enemy will get stunned for longer.

Notes:

We strongly recommend to download the game to play it, it seems to have minor bugs in the browser.

When loading levels it will seem to crash, just wait for the game to catch up it's some bug we haven't figured out yet.

The game isn't finished, plus even if we would love to finish it we are finding ourselves unable to do it for this jam. Since we are resuming our studies soon we will not update in a while. But keep in mind we will finish this, I swear!

The Team:

In this game we've partaken Edgelord and Tortitas. Most of the hard visual design is not ours as the credits section shows, but we've worked really hard on this project. The game has been made in Unity 2020 and it's the first game I make as a programmer with a bigger scope and posibilities of actually finishing it. Music has been done by Edgelord with Musescore, FLStudio and much videogame music experience.
